products.productDescription: Decorate your cakes or cupcakes with this Creative Converting gold glitter "fifty" cake topper! This gold glitter cake topper is sure to bring attention to your desserts and give them an extra sparkle. Plus, the glitter won't flake off onto your cake, leaving it safe and ready to devour! Because it's made with food grade paper, you can simply stick the topper into your dessert to decorate. Perfect for birthday, anniversary, and other occasion parties, this cake topper can be combined with other numerical toppers to create a memorable celebration for you and your guests. When your guests have finished, this topper is disposable for easy cleanup.
